channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Flytipping on Dinas Green, 26th February
item.description:
Flytipping on Dinas Green Shopping trolley reported on trolley wise app

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 15;16, Dinas Close, Warden Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: The entire length of Whittington Road is riddled with Potholes, 26th February
item.description:
These potholes have been reported for at least 2 years . They are patched up and the re appear after a few weeks..None of the debris is cleared up . As you can see from the photos of outside 41 Whittington Road it is a mess . This applies to the whole length of Whittington Road

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 41, Whittington Road, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: A pothole in road problem, 26th February
item.description:
Benhall Avenue is deteriorating particularly near the junction with Miserden Road. I am just enquiring whether there is any works planned to be done to rectify the deterioration here soon? It's got to the point where I am having to use different routes to get around using this section of carriageway to avoid damaging my car.
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Illegal ramp obstructing road, 26th February
item.description:
Outside 33/35 Mill Lane. Resident concerned about accident
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 35, Mill Lane, Brockworth, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Other damage to pavement i.e. cobbles, raised mound/surface

item.title: Fridges and freezers, 26th February
item.description:
Someone has left at least two fridges/freezers in the wooded area at the back of the old golf course off Tommy Taylors Lane

item.title: Incorrect signage, 26th February
item.description:
This sign is dated Aug 2025 and has no relevance for the parking restrictions for Raceweek. The correct signage should be 30 minutes only for customers

item.title: Multiple signs and barriers left on road along Kayte lane, 26th February
item.description:
There are numerous barriers signs and sandbags left along Kayte lane from where the road has been closed due to flooding. Many of these are close to the raod edge and pose a risk as the road is narrow and unlit
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Kayte Lane, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Signs & Barriers left behind by Contractor

item.title: Green or amber traffic light is not working problem, 26th February
item.description:
Perm lights fualty lights had gone blank and then the amber light showed and it is now stuck on whilst the lights change like normal

item.title: Light sensor is not detecting vehicles problem, 26th February
item.description:
Customer reports that the temporary TS at the location are out and that they have been stuck in traffic for around an hour. They state that nobody was on site when they passed through and that this stretches back to the A417.
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Light sensor is not detecting vehicles

item.title: 2 way traffic lights, 26th February
item.description:
Both traffic lights on constant red No workers on site Traffic build up enormous all the way to shell garage In brockworth and up a417 I don’t know the impact into Cheltenham
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 102, Shurdington Road, Warden Hill, Cheltenham

cluster of pothole in one location

item.title: Temporary traffic lights stick on ref, 26th February
item.description:
Traffic lights stuck on red causing traffic to run the Red light heading to Cheltenham once on coming traffic heading out of Cheltenham stops. This is causing massive tailbacks and delays.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Shurdington Road, Shurdington, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Light sensor is not detecting vehicles

item.title: Temporary traffic lights stuck on red, 26th February
item.description:
Traffic lights are stuck on red for traffic travelling to Cheltenham. Traffic is having to go when on coming traffic stops for a red on their side heading out of Cheltenham. It is causing seriously long delays.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Shurdington Road, Brockworth, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Light sensor is not detecting vehicles

item.title: Very deep pothole, 26th February
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Kayte Lane, Tewkesbury

item.title: 24 potholes, 26th February
item.description:
Yes I’ve counted them- deep and wide, stretching a good 200 metres along this road- people are swerving into the opposite.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hayden Road, Hesters Way, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Hugs potholes, 26th February
item.description:
Not just one- the whole street on one side is covered in deep and wide potholes causing people to swerve onto the over side of the road
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hayden Road, Hesters Way, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
